text: Ore cuni nast, ki sumoro ʙehtarini ummatho gardonidem, to ʙar mardumon guvoh ʙosed va pajomʙar ʙar sumo guvoh ʙosad. Va on qiʙlaero, ki ru ʙa rui on meistodi, digargun nakardem, cuz ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki ononro, ki az pajomʙar pajravi mekunand, az onon, ki pajravi namekunand, ʙozsinosem. Harcand, ki in amr ʙar ƣajri hidojatjoftagon dusvor menamud. Xudo imoni sumoro taʙoh namekunad. U ʙar mardumon mehruʙon va ʙaxsojanda ast
